text: NY1 (also known as Time Warner Cable News NY1 and spoken as "New York One") is an American cable news television channel. It is owned by Time Warner Cable. The channel provides 24-hour news coverage, with a focus on the five boroughs of New York City. Its programming primarily features news and weather forecasts. NY1 also features specialty programs such as Inside City Hall (which is renamed Road to City Hall during New York City mayoral elections). == References == Category:American television channels Category:Time Warner subsidiaries Category:Entertainment in New York City
title: Time Warner Cable News NY1
